category: Management group operation regulations/Article 3 (Notice of designation of management group)
contents: Article 3 (Notice of Designation of Management Organization) As soon as the Sports Association designates a member organization as a management organization, it shall clearly state the following matters and notify the member organization in writing (including electronic documents). Revised 2021. 10. 6. 1. Reasons for designation of management group 2. Date of designation of management group 3. Effect of designation of management group 4. Cancellation of officer approval 5. Other major matters
